actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Illinois Land Conservation Act of 1995 to provide for the use of certain fees and receipts collected under that Act for public schools and public roads in the vicinity of Midewin National Tallgrass Prairie, Illinois.

summary.text: Amends the Illinois Land Conservation Act of 1995 to require the Secretary of the Treasury to make available to the State of Illinois a quarter of certain monies collected with respect to Midewin National Tallgrass Prairie, Illinois, for expenditure for the benefit of public schools and roads in the vicinity of the Prairie.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Illinois Land Conservation Act of 1995 to provide for the use of certain fees and receipts collected under that Act for public schools and public roads in the vicinity of Midewin National Tallgrass Prairie, Illinois.
